article.title: Sierra Nevada to Develop Data Fusion and Network Integration Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sierra Nevada Corporation, Sparks, Nevada, was awarded a $42,250,000 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the research and development services in the area of innovative centric, data fusion, network integration concepts and technologies. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
